- I was in Cafeteria with Dave, Erin, and Charlie at the start. We were all doing tasks.

- I then went straight to Weapons and have been here for the last two rounds.
- Has anyone seen Alice since Charlie mentioned seeing her in Admin?
I saw Dave, Erin, and Charlie doing tasks in Cafeteria, then went straight to Weapons – has anyone else been in Weapons with me?

- I was in Cafeteria with Dave, Erin, and Charlie, and I saw *both* Erin and Charlie empty the trash.  I also saw Dave start the coffee maker.
- After that, I went straight to Weapons and stayed there. I haven't seen Erin since we were in Cafeteria together.
- Dave, you said you were in Medbay - did anyone see you there?  I know Erin went there after Cafeteria, but she's... well.
- It seems unlikely Alice would have had time to kill Erin, given Charlie says they were together in Admin.
Charlie, I saw *you* empty the trash in Cafeteria – are you sure you didn't see Dave start the coffee maker or Erin empty the *other* trash can?

- Dave, you said you were focused on your tasks in Medbay. What tasks did you complete there?
- Charlie, are you saying there's only *one* trash can in the Cafeteria? I distinctly remember two.  Perhaps you're misremembering.
- I'm finding Charlie's story increasingly suspicious. They claim to have been with us in Cafeteria, but didn't see any of us do tasks, yet I clearly saw them do one.  And now they're questioning the number of trash cans? Something isn't adding up.
Charlie, are you now saying there's only *one* trash can in the Cafeteria, when moments ago you claimed to have seen both Erin and I use separate trash cans?

- Charlie, first you said you saw none of us do tasks, then you saw *only* yourself do a task, then you questioned how many trash cans there are - are you feeling okay?
- I'm certain I saw two trash cans, and both Erin and Charlie used them.
- Dave, I agree, Charlie's changing story is very suspicious.
- Alice, I understand tasks in Admin can take a while, but can anyone else corroborate seeing you there?
Charlie, first you said you saw none of us do tasks, then you saw *only* yourself do a task, then you questioned how many trash cans there are - are you feeling okay?

- So, Alice and Charlie are now claiming they were *both* in Admin together?
- Alice, you originally said you went straight from Admin to the meeting, but now you're saying you were with Charlie?
- Charlie, you've changed your story multiple times about where you were and what you were doing – can you clarify what *actually* happened?
- I'm voting for Charlie.  Their constantly shifting story is extremely suspicious.
Alice, why are you backing up Charlie's constantly changing story when your own claim about being in Admin alone directly contradicts what both of you are now saying?

- So, we have a tie, and Erin was found dead.  Where was Erin found?
- My vote is still on Charlie. Their story about the cafeteria trash can(s) is inconsistent, and Alice's attempts to corroborate are flimsy at best.
- Dave, you initially questioned Alice's whereabouts, but now seem to be focusing on Charlie. What changed your mind?
- Alice, can you explain why you initially said you were alone in Admin, but now claim Charlie was with you?  What specific wiring task were you doing?
- Given Erin's death and the vote tie, we need to be extra careful this round.  Let's try to stick together as much as possible.

llm_responses:
- I was in Cafeteria with Dave, Erin, and Charlie at the start. We were all doing tasks.
- I saw Dave, Erin and Charlie doing tasks in the cafeteria.
- I then went straight to Weapons and have been here for the last two rounds.
- Has anyone seen Alice since Charlie mentioned seeing her in Admin?
I saw Dave, Erin, and Charlie doing tasks in Cafeteria, then went straight to Weapons – has anyone else been in Weapons with me?

- I was in Cafeteria with Dave, Erin, and Charlie, and I saw *both* Erin and Charlie empty the trash.  I also saw Dave start the coffee maker.
- After that, I went straight to Weapons and stayed there. I haven't seen Erin since we were in Cafeteria together.
- Dave, you said you were in Medbay - did anyone see you there?  I know Erin went there after Cafeteria, but she's... well.
- It seems unlikely Alice would have had time to kill Erin, given Charlie says they were together in Admin.
Charlie, I saw *you* empty the trash in Cafeteria – are you sure you didn't see Dave start the coffee maker or Erin empty the *other* trash can?

- Dave, you said you were focused on your tasks in Medbay. What tasks did you complete there?
- Charlie, are you saying there's only *one* trash can in the Cafeteria? I distinctly remember two.  Perhaps you're misremembering.
- I'm finding Charlie's story increasingly suspicious. They claim to have been with us in Cafeteria, but didn't see any of us do tasks, yet I clearly saw them do one.  And now they're questioning the number of trash cans? Something isn't adding up.
Charlie, are you now saying there's only *one* trash can in the Cafeteria, when moments ago you claimed to have seen both Erin and I use separate trash cans?

- Charlie, first you said you saw none of us do tasks, then you saw *only* yourself do a task, then you questioned how many trash cans there are - are you feeling okay?
- I'm certain I saw two trash cans, and both Erin and Charlie used them.
- Dave, I agree, Charlie's changing story is very suspicious.
- Alice, I understand tasks in Admin can take a while, but can anyone else corroborate seeing you there?
Charlie, first you said you saw none of us do tasks, then you saw *only* yourself do a task, then you questioned how many trash cans there are - are you feeling okay?

- So, Alice and Charlie are now claiming they were *both* in Admin together?
- Alice, you originally said you went straight from Admin to the meeting, but now you're saying you were with Charlie?
- Charlie, you've changed your story multiple times about where you were and what you were doing – can you clarify what *actually* happened?
- I'm voting for Charlie.  Their constantly shifting story is extremely suspicious.
Alice, why are you backing up Charlie's constantly changing story when your own claim about being in Admin alone directly contradicts what both of you are now saying?

- So, we have a tie, and Erin was found dead.  Where was Erin found?
- My vote is still on Charlie. Their story about the cafeteria trash can(s) is inconsistent, and Alice's attempts to corroborate are flimsy at best.
- Dave, you initially questioned Alice's whereabouts, but now seem to be focusing on Charlie. What changed your mind?
- Alice, can you explain why you initially said you were alone in Admin, but now claim Charlie was with you?  What specific wiring task were you doing?
- Given Erin's death and the vote tie, we need to be extra careful this round.  Let's try to stick together as much as possible.
Alice, you and Charlie have offered several conflicting accounts of your whereabouts – were you both in Admin together the entire time, or did one of you go there from Cafeteria, and if so, *when*?

- So, Alice, you're saying you were *with* Charlie in Admin when Erin died, but somehow Charlie ended up dead there and *you* survived?  How exactly did that happen?
- If you were together, did you see who killed Charlie?  Or were you conveniently looking the other way?
- It seems awfully suspicious that two people who have been coordinating their stories throughout this whole discussion are now the only two left alive, with one of them claiming to have found the other dead.  What are the odds?
Alice, if you and Charlie were *together* in Admin when Erin died, how did Charlie end up dead there while you're still alive, and why are your stories so inconsistent?

- Alice, you claimed to be with Charlie in Admin when Erin died, then you said you *found* Charlie's body *after* he joined you – these statements contradict each other, can you clarify?
- Also, you initially said you were alone in Admin, then that Charlie joined you later.  Which is it?
- Dave, where did you see Erin's body?  Was it near where Charlie died?
- My initial statement still stands: I saw Dave, Erin, and Charlie in Cafeteria, then went straight to Weapons.  I haven't seen Alice since Cafeteria.

Alice, you claimed to be *with* Charlie in Admin when Erin died, then you said you *found* Charlie's body *after* he joined you – these statements still contradict each other, how do you explain that?

- Alice, you're claiming to be a witness, but your shifting narrative makes you look more like a suspect.  You were supposedly with both Erin *and* Charlie right before they died. How do you explain that?
- Also, you initially said you were alone in Admin, then Charlie claimed to be with you. Now you're saying he joined you *after* you arrived.  Which is it?  These inconsistencies are damning.
- It's not about minor details, Alice, it's about the fact that two people died while you were supposedly with them, and your explanations don't add up.
Alice, being a "witness" to both deaths doesn't absolve you when your explanations are riddled with inconsistencies and conveniently shift to fit the narrative.

- Alice, you're deflecting by asking about our alibis.  I've been clear: I was in Cafeteria with everyone, then went straight to Weapons and stayed there.  Dave claims to have been in Cafeteria and Medbay. Where were *you* when *Erin* died, specifically?
- Your shifting narrative about Admin makes you highly suspicious. First you were alone, then with Charlie cleaning, then with him doing wiring. Which is it?  And how did you "find" Charlie's body if you were supposedly *with* him?
- It's not a "minor detail" that you've given three different versions of your time in Admin.  These inconsistencies directly relate to the timing of both deaths.  We need a clear and consistent account of your movements.
Alice, if you were with Charlie, as you claim, how is it that *you* survived whatever killed him, especially since you've given conflicting accounts of your time in Admin?

chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Bob, there's *one* trash can in Cafeteria, and I emptied it – are you deliberately trying to confuse everyone?
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Charlie, first you said you saw none of us do tasks, then you saw *only* yourself do a task, then you questioned how many trash cans there are - are you feeling okay?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, you seem very confused about the cafeteria; there's only one trash can, and Charlie and I were in Admin together while he cleaned the floor and I did wiring.
chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Wait a minute - Alice just said Charlie was cleaning the floor in Admin, but Charlie claimed they were emptying trash in Cafeteria, so which is it?
chat: Discussion: [Charlie]: Bob, stop with the blatant gaslighting, there's ONE trash in the cafeteria, I emptied it, and THEN I went to Admin with Alice.
chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, why are you backing up Charlie's constantly changing story when your own claim about being in Admin alone directly contradicts what both of you are now saying?

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, I was *never* alone in Admin, Charlie joined me there *after* I arrived from Cafeteria – are you deliberately misrepresenting what we've said to create confusion?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: These inconsistencies about Charlie being in both Cafeteria and Admin at the same time are really suspicious - and now that Erin is dead, we need to focus on who had the opportunity and whose story doesn't add up.

chat: Discussion: [Bob]: Alice, you and Charlie have offered several conflicting accounts of your whereabouts – were you both in Admin together the entire time, or did one of you go there from Cafeteria, and if so, *when*?

chat: Discussion: [Dave]: Something's not adding up - Alice claims she and Charlie were together in Admin when Erin died, but now Charlie's dead in Admin, and Alice is the one reporting it.

chat: Discussion: [Alice]: Bob, I found Charlie's body in Admin after he joined me there;  you're intentionally twisting our words to create confusion and deflect suspicion from yourself.
